description: 9 Needs-Based Emotional Bond Drivers - Single Source of Truth for the Universal Brand System

core_principle.axiom: Emotional drivers create bonds stronger than logic. Meet the need, earn the loyalty.
core_principle.mechanism: Each need, when fulfilled, creates a specific psychological bond that transcends transactional relationship.

needs.name: Validation / Hope
needs.copy_application: Your instincts were right all along. The path you sensed exists.
trigger_phrases: This is exactly what I needed to hear
needs.bond_effect: Association → Inspiration. They see you as the one who believed in them.
needs.when_to_deploy: When prospect is stuck, doubting themselves, or at a crossroads

needs.name: Absolution
needs.copy_application: It's not your fault — it's the system. The deck was stacked against you.
trigger_phrases: I was set up to fail
needs.bond_effect: Relief → Receptivity. Guilt removed, they're ready to receive solution.
needs.when_to_deploy: When prospect carries shame or self-blame about their situation

needs.name: Security
needs.copy_application: Provide evidence until fears subside. Address every 'what if' scenario.
needs.bond_effect: Undivided gratitude. Fear consumes cognitive resources; removing it earns devotion.
needs.when_to_deploy: When prospect is paralyzed by risk, uncertainty, or potential loss

needs.name: Confirmation
needs.copy_application: You suspected this for years. You were right. Here's the proof.
needs.bond_effect: Superiority surge → Instant ally. You validated their intelligence.
needs.when_to_deploy: When prospect has private doubts about conventional wisdom

needs.name: Camaraderie
needs.copy_application: Together against [enemy]. We're fighting the same fight.
needs.bond_effect: Friend → Partner. Shared enemy creates shared identity.
needs.when_to_deploy: When there's a clear antagonist (industry, system, competitor, status quo)

needs.name: Significance
needs.copy_application: Six-step activation: Stakes → Role → Importance → Qualification → Sacrifice → Commit
needs.bond_effect: Cult-level loyalty. They feel irreplaceable in the mission.
six_step_sequence: Define their role (what only they can do)
needs.when_to_deploy: When building community, movement, or high-ticket relationships

needs.name: Agency
needs.copy_application: The decision is yours. You're in control. No pressure.
needs.bond_effect: Freedom → Deeper commitment. Paradox: Giving freedom increases loyalty.
needs.when_to_deploy: At decision points, especially when asking for commitment

needs.name: Gnosis
needs.copy_application: What insiders know. The hidden truth. What they don't want you to see.
needs.bond_effect: Irresistible curiosity → Elevated status. Secret knowledge confers power.
needs.when_to_deploy: When offering exclusive insights, hidden mechanisms, or insider perspective

needs.name: Certainty
needs.copy_application: Let them be right. Then add to it. Never contradict directly.
needs.bond_effect: Threat removed → Loyalty. Ego protected, walls come down.
needs.when_to_deploy: When prospect has strong existing beliefs that align with your message

usage_rules.reference_by: Use semantic ID (e.g., NEED_VALIDATION) not position in all documents
usage_rules.selection_guide: Identify prospect's dominant unmet need, then deploy matching copy
usage_rules.stacking: Deploy 2-3 needs per piece for compound bonding effect
usage_rules.warning: Overusing NEED_ABSOLUTION without solution creates victimhood, not action

relationship_to_lf8.distinction: LF8 = biological drives (hardwired). Emotional Bonds = psychological needs (relational).
relationship_to_lf8.integration: LF8 creates initial desire. Emotional Bonds create lasting loyalty.
relationship_to_lf8.sequence: Hook with LF8 → Bond with Needs → Retain through relationship
